Title: The Number of the Beast Is 666
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jeff Vlaming, Angela LaManna, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: The FBI enlists the help of Dr. Fredrick Chilton in hope of drawing Francis Dolarhyde into an ambush; Will's empathy for Dolarhyde impacts his psyche.
